Text: Wow.  My Father will be in heaven.  He used to tell me he could walk from house to house and never miss a minute of Jack Benny.  He never like the television show, but loved radio.  Thank you to the uploader for this wonderful pearl.

@geneulm: glad your father can enjoy it.

i hope no problems downloading it. i'm actually surprised at how popular this has been at points, so much so that when i forgot to back it up, a new download was rather quick at restoring it.
Thank you so much! Fantastic download!
